name: Vent, Her Darling
text:
Partner with Petal, His Flame (When this creature enters the battlefield, target player may put Petal, His Flame into their hand from their library, then shuffle.)

Whenever you discard one or more cards, meditate(Put an orb counter on a Chi you control. If you don’t control one, first create a Chi enchantment token with "{1}, Sacrifice this: Copy target instant or sorcery spell you control with mana value less than or equal to the number of orb counters on this. You may choose new targets for the copy.")
